name: Vulcan's Dungeon
description:
Explore Vulcan's Dungeon in order to become stronger, more defensive, and a better cook in order to defeat Vulcan. 

This game is played exclusively with the keyboard.

WASD - Movement

Q - Target objects in range

Space - Interact with targetted object

E - Eat food (if you have any)

R - Hold to teleport back to the starting room

Made for 7DRL 2021

https://itch.io/jam/7drl-challenge-2021

@me in my discord: 

https://discord.gg/TCyHkAR
